setup.title: Setup Your Game
setup.subtitle: Build tower, scan QR code, and choose your mode

step1.title: Build the Tower
step1.description: Stack your numbered blocks in rows of 3, alternating direction each layer. Standard tower has 18 layers (54 blocks). Numbers can be in any order - the app randomizes tasks!

step2.title: Scan & Join
step2.description: All players scan the game QR code. One device controls the game, others follow along. Choose your mode (Party, Drinking, Couples, etc.) and difficulty level.

step3.title: First Player
step3.description: The app randomly selects who starts. Let the games begin!

step1.title: Test & Pull
step1.description: Use ONE hand only to test blocks. Touch to find loose ones. Can't pull from the top completed layer (highest row with 3 blocks). Pull your block carefully!

step2.title: Enter Number
step2.description: Type the block's number into the app. Your challenge appears on screen!

step3.title: Complete or Decline
step3.description: Do the challenge OR choose a penalty (see below). Some tasks involve the whole group!

step4.title: Stack on Top
step4.description: Place your block on top, alternating direction from the layer below. Pass to the next player - the app shows whose turn it is.

challenges.title: Handling Challenges

accept.title: Accept the Challenge
accept.description: Complete the task shown. Most are fun and matched to your difficulty level. Embrace the chaos!

decline.title: Decline the Challenge
decline.penalty2: Party Mode: Truth or Dare from the group
decline.penalty3: All Modes: Pull 2 blocks on your next turn

challenges.note: The app doesn't enforce anything - your group decides! Set boundaries before playing, especially in intense modes.

what-is.question: What is Universal Jenga?
what-is.answer: Universal Jenga is a hybrid party game that combines the classic Jenga tower with digital challenges. Number your tower blocks (1-54), scan a QR code, and get random tasks assigned to each number. Perfect for parties, drinking games, couples, and families.

how-different.question: How is this different from regular Jenga?
how-different.answer: Instead of writing tasks on blocks, you number them 1-54. Our app assigns random challenges to each number, meaning infinite replayability. One tower works for all game modes - party, drinking, couples, family, and more.

need-app.question: Do I need to download an app?
need-app.answer: No downloads required! Simply scan the QR code on your numbered tower with your phone's camera and start playing instantly. Works on any smartphone browser.

languages.question: What languages are supported?
languages.answer: Universal Jenga supports multiple languages including English, German, Spanish, and French. More languages are added regularly based on community demand.

where-buy-tower.question: Where can I buy a Jenga tower?
where-buy-tower.answer: You can use any standard Jenga set from toy stores, Amazon, or local retailers. We also offer DIY instructions to build your own tower from wood. No special equipment needed - just number the blocks 1-54 with a marker!

age-rating.question: What's the age rating?
age-rating.answer: Party Mode and Family Mode are suitable for ages 12+. Drinking Games require participants to be of legal drinking age (18+ or 21+ depending on your country). Couples Mode is designed for adults 18+. Always drink responsibly.

cost.question: Is Universal Jenga free?
cost.answer: Yes! The basic version is completely free with Party Mode and Drinking Games. No credit card required. Premium unlocks additional modes, unlimited players, and custom tasks for $4.99/month.

how-to-play.question: How do I play?
how-to-play.answer:
1. Number your Jenga blocks 1-54
2. Scan the QR code with your phone
3. Select a game mode
4. Pull a block and complete the challenge for that number
5. Stack it on top and pass to the next player

how-many-players.question: How many players can join?
how-many-players.answer: Free version supports 2-6 players. Premium unlocks unlimited players, perfect for large parties. The game adapts based on player count.

skip-task.question: Can I skip a task?
skip-task.answer: That's up to your group's house rules! The app doesn't enforce skipping penalties, so decide as a group. Common rules: drink to skip, lose a turn, or add an extra block to pull next round.

customize-tasks.question: Can I customize or add my own tasks?
customize-tasks.answer: Yes! Premium members can create custom tasks and save them to reuse with friends. You can also mix custom tasks with our curated challenges.

tower-falls.question: What happens when the tower falls?
tower-falls.answer: Classic Jenga rules apply! The player who knocks over the tower loses that round. You can start a new game immediately with the same or different mode. Your session history is saved so you can track wins and losses.

multiplayer.question: How does multiplayer work?
multiplayer.answer: One device controls the game. After pulling a block, show the screen to the player so they can read their challenge. Pass the device to the next player after completing the task. Everyone sees the same challenges in real-time.

difficulty-levels.question: Can I adjust difficulty?
difficulty-levels.answer: Yes! Most game modes offer multiple difficulty levels. Easy mode has simple, lighthearted tasks. Hard/Extreme modes include more challenging and daring activities. Choose what fits your group's vibe.

game-modes.question: What game modes are available?
game-modes.answer: Party Mode (free/premium difficulty levels), Drinking Games (free), Couples (premium), Family Fun (coming soon), Festival Mode (premium), Bachelor(ette) (premium), and Custom Mode (premium).

switch-modes.question: Can I switch modes mid-game?
switch-modes.answer: Yes! You can change modes anytime during the game. The app will reassign tasks to your numbered blocks instantly.

free-vs-premium.question: What's included in free vs premium?
free-vs-premium.answer: Free: Basic party mode, drinking games, 2-6 players, 500+ challenges. Premium: All modes unlocked, unlimited players, 5000+ challenges, custom tasks, priority support, and new content first.

couples-mode.question: What makes Couples Mode special?
couples-mode.answer: Couples Mode includes romantic, intimate, and relationship-building challenges designed for two people. Choose between Playful (flirty fun) and After Dark (adults only) difficulty levels. Perfect for date nights or getting to know each other better.

drinking-mode-rules.question: How do drinking games work?
drinking-mode-rules.answer: Each challenge tells players when to drink (e.g., 'Take 2 sips', 'Everyone drinks', 'Make a rule'). You can use beer, shots, or non-alcoholic drinks. Always drink responsibly and never drink and drive. Have fun, stay safe!

family-mode.question: Is there a kid-friendly mode?
family-mode.answer: Yes! Family Mode (coming soon) features age-appropriate challenges perfect for family game nights. No inappropriate content, just fun activities that everyone can enjoy together. Great for ages 8+.

offline-play.question: Can I play offline?
offline-play.answer: Initial setup requires internet to load tasks. After loading, you can play offline. Tasks are cached on your device for uninterrupted gameplay.

compatible-devices.question: What devices work with Universal Jenga?
compatible-devices.answer: Works on any smartphone or tablet with a camera and modern browser (Safari, Chrome, Firefox, Edge). iOS 14+ and Android 8+ recommended.

save-progress.question: Does the game save my progress?
save-progress.answer: Yes! Your game session is automatically saved. If you close the browser, you can resume from where you left off by scanning the QR code again.

privacy.question: What data do you collect?
privacy.answer: We only collect anonymous gameplay statistics to improve the experience. No personal data, no tracking, no ads. Check our Privacy Policy for details.

multiple-devices.question: Can I use multiple devices?
multiple-devices.answer: Yes! You can access your account and game sessions from any device by logging in. Premium subscriptions work across all your devices. Game progress syncs automatically when online.

bugs-issues.question: What if I encounter a bug?
bugs-issues.answer: Contact us at support{'@'}universaljenga.com with details about the issue. Include your device type, browser, and what happened. We typically respond within 24 hours and fix critical bugs immediately.

internet-required.question: Do I need constant internet connection?
internet-required.answer: Only for initial setup and switching modes. Once tasks are loaded, they're cached locally so you can play without internet. Perfect for camping trips, cabins, or anywhere with spotty connection!

premium-cost.question: How much does Premium cost?
premium-cost.answer: Premium is $4.99/month or $39.99/year (save 33%). Cancel anytime, no questions asked. Free trial available for new users.

cancel-subscription.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel-subscription.answer: Go to Account Settings → Subscription → Cancel Subscription. You'll keep premium access until the end of your billing period. No cancellation fees.

refund.question: Do you offer refunds?
refund.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied. Contact support{'@'}universaljenga.com with your order number.

payment-methods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment-methods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All payments are processed securely through Stripe. Your payment information is never stored on our servers.

upgrade-downgrade.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
upgrade-downgrade.answer: Yes! Upgrade to Premium anytime to unlock all features instantly. If you cancel Premium, you'll keep access until the end of your billing period, then automatically switch to the free version.

group-discount.question: Do you offer group or bulk discounts?
group-discount.answer: Yes! Contact sales{'@'}universaljenga.com for bulk licenses for events, parties, or organizations. We offer special pricing for orders of 10+ premium accounts. Perfect for festivals, party planners, and corporate events.
